meanings.definition: To surpass in skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: She outmasters her opponents in every game they play.
meanings.sent2: The champion outmasters all the other players on the team.
meanings.sent3: The young magician outmasters the older ones with her new tricks.
meanings.sent4: His determination to outmasters his fears is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The artist outmasters the canvas with every stroke of the brush.

meanings.definition: The person who surpasses others in skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: He is known as the outmasters of the chess club.
meanings.sent2: The outmasters of the competition received a gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The outmasters of the kitchen surprised everyone with their cooking skills.
meanings.sent4: She became the outmasters of the dance floor with her graceful moves.
meanings.sent5: The outmasters of the art class always create stunning masterpieces.
